2. PzNDTDTBO - This is a material name, likely representing the name of a specific polymer used in the PSCs.
3. HOMO - This is a material property, likely representing the highest occupied molecular orbital energy level of the polymer.
4. J sc - This is a material property, likely representing the short-circuit current density of the PSCs.
5. FF - This is a material property, likely representing the fill factor of the PSCs.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions or need further clarification.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The increased value of V oc of PzNDTDTBO - based PSCs is in accordance with the decreased value of the HOMO energy level of the polymer and the higher J sc and FF could be attributed to the higher hole mobility ( 4.4 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 ).

Let's think step by step.

Sure! In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. V oc: This stands for "open-circuit voltage" and refers to the maximum voltage that a solar cell can reach when it is in an open-circuit configuration.
2. PzNDTDTBO: This is an abbreviation for "p-type zinc oxide nanodots doped with tantalum disulfide" and refers to a specific type of polymer solar cell material.
3. HOMO energy level: This stands for "highest occupied molecular orbital energy level" and refers to the energy level at which the highest number of electrons in a molecule are occupied.
4. J sc: This stands for "short-circuit current density" and refers to the current density that a solar cell can deliver when it is in a short-circuit configuration.
5. FF: This stands for "fill factor" and refers to the ratio of the actual power output of a solar cell to its maximum power output, taking into account the losses due to resistance and other factors.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities from the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. V oc: This stands for "open-circuit voltage" and refers to the maximum voltage that a solar cell can reach when it is in an open-circuit configuration.
2. HOMO energy level: This stands for "highest occupied molecular orbital energy level" and refers to the energy level at which the highest number of electrons in a molecule are occupied.
3. FF: This stands for "fill factor" and refers to the ratio of the actual power output of a solar cell to its maximum power output, taking into account the losses due to resistance and other factors.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities from the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| V oc |
| HOMO energy level |
| FF |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
